question:
[Morgan] just had a baby and presented the baby proudly to the new maternal grandmother, [Debra]. [Harry] took his sister [Morgan] too the zoo but his sister [Melissa] could n't come because she had to work. [Morgan] was always arguing with her mother's husband [Kevin]. [Brian] married his wife [Melissa] right out of high school. His son [Scott] was born just after the ceremony followed by [Linda] the year after. [Kevin] is very much in love with his wife. Her name is [Debra]. [Morgan] and her sister, [Valerie], frequently bicker. However, they always make up quickly. [Dale] went to the game with his sister [Valerie].
Question: How is [Linda] related to [Dale]?
